config.ding.cat.ding.name: Ding-related Configs
config.ding.cat.ding.desc: Configs related to how ding works
config.ding.prop.name.name: (Load) Sound Name
config.ding.prop.name.desc:
Resource Location based name of the sound file to play when Minecraft finishes loading.
EG: "ui.button.click" or "entity.experience_orb.pickup"

This can also be a mod sound if the mod is installed.
EG: modname:modsound.boing

If you want to use external sounds, consider looking into the mod Additional Resources
config.ding.prop.pitch.name: (Load) Sound Pitch
config.ding.prop.pitch.desc: Pitch of the sound (when Minecraft loads)
config.ding.prop.category.name: (Load) Sound Category
config.ding.prop.category.desc: Sound category for the sound played when Minecraft finishes loading. EG: "ambient" or "music". Defaults to "master" if Ding cannot find your category.
config.ding.prop.nameWorld.name: (World Load) Sound Name
config.ding.prop.nameWorld.desc:
Resource Location based name of the sound file to play when the world finishes loading (after connecting to a server).

Look at the "name" config for more details.
config.ding.prop.pitchWorld.name: (World Load) Sound Pitch
config.ding.prop.pitchWorld.desc: Pitch of the sound (when the world loads after connecting to a server)
config.ding.prop.categoryWorld.name: (World Load) Sound Category
config.ding.prop.categoryWorld.desc: Sound category for the sound played when the world finishes loading (after connecting to a server). EG: "ambient" or "music". Defaults to "master" if Ding cannot find your category.
config.ding.prop.nameResourcesReload.des:
Resource Location based name of the sound file to play when resources complete reloading.

Look at the "name" config for more details.
config.ding.prop.pitchResourcesReload.de: Pitch of the sound (when resources complete reloading)
config.ding.prop.categoryResourcesReload: Sound category for the sound played when resources complete reloading. EG: "ambient" or "music". Defaults to "master" if Ding cannot find your category.
config.ding.prop.playOnLoad.name: Play Sound - Load
config.ding.prop.playOnLoad.desc: Play sound when the game loads.
config.ding.prop.playOnWorld.name: Play Sound - World Load
config.ding.prop.playOnWorld.desc: Play sound when the world loads after connecting to a server. Requires game to be restarted when changing this option.
config.ding.prop.playOnResourcesReload.d: Play sound when resources complete reloading. Requires game to be restarted when changing this option.
config.ding.cat.ding.load.name: Minecraft Load-related Configs
config.ding.cat.ding.load.desc: Configs for ding to trigger when the game loads
config.ding.cat.ding.world.name: Loading a world-related Configs
config.ding.cat.ding.world.desc: Configs for ding to trigger when the world loads after connecting to a server
config.ding.cat.ding.resourcesReload.des: Configs for ding to trigger when resources are reloaded
config.ding.prop.volume.name: (Load) Sound Volume
config.ding.prop.volume.desc: Volume of the volume (when Minecraft loads)
config.ding.prop.volumeWorld.name: (World Load) Sound Volume
config.ding.prop.volumeWorld.desc: Volume of the sound (when the world loads after connecting to a server)
config.ding.prop.volumeResourcesReload.d: Volume of the sound (when resources complete reloading)
